articles.description: After Australia's Mitchell Starc dismissed Suryakumar Yadav for a second straight golden duck in the ODI series, former India opener Wasim Jaffer has backed Sanju Samson to spearhead the middle-order of the Indian side.  | Cricket

articles.title: Menindee: Australia begins mass fish death clean-up - BBC
articles.description: Authorities are working out what to do with millions of rotting fish and reassuring the public about water quality.
articles.content:
A major clean-up effort is under way in Australia after millions of fish died in a river in western New South Wales (NSW).
